actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the reinstatement and extension of the authorization for the beach erosion control project for Presque Isle Peninsula, Erie, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes the reinstatement and extension of the authorization for the beach erosion control project for Presque Isle Peninsula, Erie, Pennsylvania. Authorizes an appropriation not to exceed $3,500,000 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the reinstatement and extension of the authorization for the beach erosion control project for Presque Isle Peninsula, Erie, Pennsylvania.
